title: Gifting a skin
body: When you gift a skin to another summoner, will the person receiving the gift know who it's from?

replies.body: These features are available!  The client should have features to notify you when a gift has been opened.  The recipient will also receive a toast with the name of the sender too.  Let me know if that clears things up!
If the gift (skin) has been sent to another summoner, the summoner must open the gift in order to use the skin? This notifies the sender that the gift has been opened?

It's totally possible to miss the gift notification and not open it, but the gift would already be unlocked on the account and usable.  Once you send the gift it will be unlocked to that account, so the notification is just toast to celebrate the occasion.  Let me know if that helps.
Can you provide a screenshot of what it looks like when someone receives a gift?
